tweets.text: I don't live close enough to the dump to smell it, but Newcastle-u-L's @StinkStopthe campaign highlights the serious flaws in UK environment regulation, and the toothlessness of an underfunded and underpowered Environment Agency. https://t.co/Hfu0RzlO0a

One of the REALLY neat things about #CitrixWorkspace microapps is how dynamic the notifications can be with very little effort. Here, there's a change to a #StormChristophe flood alert and the notification gives the old and new severity value. Very useful indeed. https://t.co/uP6Sx5Nzm3

@maricaoneill @LoveZoflora @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe It is ,your right. We live near the Cherry Tree and it‚Äôs getting worse not sure what the outcome will be either. Not looking good at the moment.

You‚Äôd be forgiven in thinking this is a graph showing rising cases of #Covid19. It‚Äôs not. It‚Äôs showing you that over 85% of national complaints made to @EnvAgency are regarding @RedIndustries2 ‚Äòs Walley‚Äôs Quarry landfill. This is a national scandal! #StopTheStink https://t.co/scwGtl1ue8

tweets.text:
@peterstopcrime Hi Peter,

I've spoken to our waste policy staff about this and they have asked if I could grab your contact details so that they may contact you directly to discuss further. Please could you DM us your email address?

Thanks,
Garin https://t.co/yxXzwYx3M1

Storm outfalls are a key source of pollution in the aquatic environment. With a new understanding of the number of discharge events taking place, the UK will legislate for improvements. Featuring @EnvAgency @WaterUK @sascampaigns https://t.co/dBtjk8Zjd9

@EnvAgency visiting #WalleysQuarry during the day is a start but the daytime odour is only the tip of the stinky iceberg. It's exponentially worse at night and I've come to dread sunset as that's when the landfill gas fills the house @PHE_uk #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @bbchealth

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk Effects might be short term for one off exposure but when the toxic gases are inside our homes 20/24 hours effects are definitely long term, these people are thick, no other words for them.

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk I'd like to register case of torture with United Nations, no one should have to suffer this sleep deprivation, haul them responsible before the international courts & treat us like the victims we are #StopTheStink
